sys_ui_message.key: Opting-in to ServiceNow Benchmarks gives you instant access to your service management Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and trends, and comparative insights relative to industry averages of your peers. It also enables your anonymized usage data to be inc
sys_ui_message.message: Opting-in to ServiceNow Benchmarks gives you instant access to your service management Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and trends, and comparative insights relative to industry averages of your peers. It also enables your anonymized usage data to be included in the global data aggregation.
